input.sentences: the soccer coach gave his big speech .
the cheerleaders then showed their pride .
the team sang the star spangled banner right before the game started .
they kicked the soccer ball around the field for a while .
the game ended in a 0-0 draw after 3 hours .
output.sentences: Tonights soccer game started with an inspiring speech from the head coach.
The cheerleaders beamed with pride as they rooted the team on.
The teams star player started the game with an easy first goal.
He zoomed around players on the field and kicked the soccer ball into the net.
The game went on for hours and ended with a draw.
